segments.text: Have a seat over there . How are things going out in the office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pretty well . Everyone is working hard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But , our business has been going down sharply the couple of months and we have to reduce some staff .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean I'm among the people who have to go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're the sales manager , but our sales didn't go up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But you know I've been working very hard . And I have a family to support .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I feel sorry , but that's the decision of the directorate .
segments.speaker: S1
